name: TularemiaTestsForFrancisellaTularensisNucleicAcid
title: Tularemia (Tests for Francisella tularensis Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Francisella tularensis nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Francisella tularensis DNA, rRNA;

LOINC search: ‘Francisella tularensis Nucleic -isolate’),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
